Loading methods#

Loading datasets#

load_dataset()

Load a dataset from the Hugging Face Hub, or a local dataset.

load_dataset_builder(path[,Â name,Â data_dir,Â ...])

Load a dataset builder which can be used to:

load_from_disk(dataset_path[,Â ...])

Loads a dataset that was previously saved using [~Dataset.save_to_disk] from a dataset directory, or from a filesystem using any implementation of fsspec.spec.AbstractFileSystem.

Loading specific formats#

load_from_disk(dataset_path[,Â ...])

Loads a dataset that was previously saved using [~Dataset.save_to_disk] from a dataset directory, or from a filesystem using any implementation of fsspec.spec.AbstractFileSystem.

Configuration#

get_dataset_config_names(path[,Â revision,Â ...])

Get the list of available config names for a particular dataset.

get_dataset_config_info(path[,Â config_name,Â ...])

Get the meta information (DatasetInfo) about a dataset for a particular config

get_dataset_infos(path[,Â data_files,Â ...])

Get the meta information about a dataset, returned as a dict mapping config name to DatasetInfoDict.

get_dataset_split_names(path[,Â config_name,Â ...])

Get the list of available splits for a particular config and dataset.

get_dataset_default_config_name(path[,Â ...])

Get the default config name for a particular dataset.

Authentication#

enable_progress_bar()

Enable globally progress bars used in datasets except if HF_DATASETS_DISABLE_PROGRESS_BAR environment variable has been set.

disable_progress_bar()

Disable globally progress bars used in datasets except if HF_DATASETS_DISABLE_PROGRESS_BAR environment variable has been set.

is_progress_bar_enabled()
